### Total of 27,876 self-directed learning articles

--

- **Scite.ai:** 22,532 articles (1966-2025)

--

- **Web of Science:** 5,174 articles (1967-2026)

--

- **International Journal of Self-Directed Learning** 170 articles (2004-2023)
